text:
Unidentified burglars broke into a house here when the inmates were away and decamped with gold and diamond jewellery worth Rs. 3.50 lakh in all.

According to a complaint filed by D. Navaneetham (69) of Ashok Nagar near New Bus Stand here, her neighbours informed her when she was away at Vedaranyam on Wednesday that the doors of her house were found open and locks broken. Upon rushing home on Thursday, she found that miscreants had removed the lock of her house, found the keys to the chest and took away gold and diamond jewellery as also cash amounting to Rs. 10,000 when she and her husband Durairaj were away.

The Tamil University police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: House burgled
